name: W.A.T.C.H. ~Truth Beyond Time~
description:
This is DEMO version of the game. So assets are subject to change. Please fill the feedback form to voice your opinion about each assets. The feedback form can be accessed from the main menu of the game or HERE.

Crowdfunding campaign currently opened. And for 10 days there will be some Early Bird tier with cheaper price. The donation from the crowdfunding will be used to develop this game, especially to hire more people to work on this game, for example A Professional EN Translator, also upgrade the current assets like BG, CG, or BGM.  You can go to the crowdfunding page from the main menu of the game or through the link in the beginning of this paragraph.

 What kind of truth might be concealed in the flow of time?

This is a story of Alto, the protagonist, that just enters the town of the Resistance, a group of the Horned against the Human Kingdom. Facing hardships to find any clues about the said group, Alto meets some certain girls who might help him to proceed.

Strict swordwoman, cheerful assassin, and calm magician. You, as Alto, seem to know each of them well overtime. But ... do you really know the real her?

W.A.T.C.H. ~Truth Beyond Time~ is a fantasy adventure visual novel in a world where the Human race dominate the other races. Even in cruel ways, which eventually lead to the raise of the Horned race's Resistance. Join the force, while experiencing an intricate romance story. Make your own choices, and see how you can interact with each girls in a more personalized way.

Genre: Romance, Fantasy, Drama, War

Romance: B x G

Languages: Bahasa Indonesia, English

Voice: EN Partial

Rating: 15+ (Light Sexual Images, Fantasy Violence)

We’re AUREA FUNSoft (Twitter), a game developer team from Indonesia. Not all of person listed below is part of us, but they are part of team that bringing this game into existence.

Sri Edi S. (Director/Programmer): Twitter

Heidy S.C. (Writer)

Fariz Muzakki (GUI Artist)

nabunabu (Character Artist)

Ainems (CG Illustration)

Haley James (Azaria VA)

Ttymto (Zula VA)

Andrea Toth (Ozelle VA)

Mahiee Maitreya (Music Composer)

AMG Soundesign (SFX)

SYSTEM REQUIREMENT
  • Windows , Linux, Mac OS.
  • 1GB RAM
  • GPU That support OpenGL 2.1 (Usually GPU from 2010-now)
  • 150MB of free space.
